DOC.brief_summary: Aim : To study stability brain MR-scanning parameter ( blood-flow , microstructure , volume , metabolism ) 1 week health volunteer . Hypothesis : MR-scanning parameter stable 1 week healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Test-retest Stability MR-parameters . A Neuroimaging Pilot-study Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: age 1865 oral write consent intracranial disease previous intracranial surgery magnetic implant magnetic foreign body claustrophobia
